cells.data:
-- index (!!) :: [a] -> Int -> Maybe a
-- index (!!) :: Gen [a] -> Int -> Maybe a
-- index (!!) :: String -> Int -> Maybe Char
on |index|(xs, i)
    if script is class of xs then
        repeat with j from 1 to i
            set v to |Î»|() of xs
        end repeat
        if missing value is not v then
            Just(v)
        else
            Nothing()
        end if
    else
        if length of xs < i then
            Nothing()
        else
            Just(item i of xs)
        end if
    end if
end |index|
